act, the commission shall consult experts designated by each member state in accordance with the principles laid down in the interinstitutional agreement of 13 april 2016 on better law-making. 5. as into force only if no objection has been expressed either by the european parliament or the council within a period of two months of notification of that act to the european parliament and the council     {"Article": "6", "Suffix": "1", "type": "pol:hasProvision", "value": "Member states shall ensure that an appropriate LNG distribution system is available in their territory, including loading facilities for LNG tank vehicles, in order to supply the refuelling points referred to in paragraphs 1, 2 and 4."},
    {"Article": "6", "Suffix": "2", "type": "pol:hasProvision", "value": "By way of derogation, neighbouring member states may, in the context of their national policy frameworks, form a pool for the purposes of fulfilling this requirement. Pooling agreements shall be the subject of the reporting obligations of the member states under this directive."},
    {"Article": "7", "Suffix": "1", "type": "pol:hasProvision", "value": "Member states shall ensure, by means of their national policy frameworks, that an appropriate number of CNG refuelling points accessible to the public are put in place by 31 December 2020, in order to ensure, in line with the sixth indent of Article 3(1), that CNG motor vehicles can circulate in urban/suburban agglomerations and other densely populated areas, and, where appropriate, within networks determined by the member states."},
    {"Article": "8", "Suffix": "1", "type": "pol:hasProvision", "value": "Member states shall ensure, by means of their national policy frameworks, that an appropriate number of CNG refuelling points accessible to the public are put in place by 31 December 2025, at least along the existing TEN-T core network, to ensure that CNG motor vehicles can circulate throughout the Union."},
    {"Article": "9", "Suffix": "1", "type": "pol:hasProvision", "value": "Member states shall ensure that CNG refuelling points for motor vehicles deployed or renewed as from 18 November 2017 comply with the technical specifications set out in point 3.4 of Annex II."},
    {"Article": "10", "Suffix": "a", "type": "pol:hasProvision", "value": "Without prejudice to Regulation (EU) No 1025/2012, the Union shall pursue the development by the relevant European or international standardisation organisations of standards, including detailed technical specifications, for refuelling points for LNG for maritime and inland waterway transport."},
    {"Article": "10", "Suffix": "b", "type": "pol:hasProvision", "value": "Without prejudice to Regulation (EU) No 1025/2012, the Union shall pursue the development by the relevant European or international standardisation organisations of standards, including detailed technical specifications, for refuelling points for LNG and CNG motor vehicles."},
    {"Article": "11", "Suffix": "a", "type": "pol:hasProvision", "value": "The Commission shall be empowered to adopt delegated acts in accordance with Article 8 to supplement this article and points 3.1, 3.2 and 3.4 of Annex II, in order to require compliance of the infrastructures to be deployed or renewed with the technical specifications contained in the standards to be developed pursuant to points (a) and (b) of paragraph 10 of this article, where the relevant ESOS have recommended only one technical solution with technical specifications as described in a relevant European standard compatible with the relevant international standards, where applicable."},
    {"Article": "11", "Suffix": "b", "type": "pol:hasProvision", "value": "The Commission shall be empowered to adopt delegated acts in accordance with Article 8 to update the references to the standards referred to in the technical specifications set out or to be set out in point 3 of Annex II where those standards are replaced by new versions thereof adopted by the relevant European or international standardisation organisations."},
    {"Article": "12", "Suffix": "1", "type": "pol:hasProvision", "value": "In the absence of a standard containing detailed technical specifications for refuelling points for LNG for maritime and inland waterway transport, referred to in point (a) of paragraph 10, and in particular in the absence of those specifications relating to bunkering of LNG, the Commission, taking into account the work ongoing within the IMO, the CCNR, the Danube Commission and other relevant international fora, shall be empowered to adopt delegated acts in accordance with Article 8 to lay down requirements for interfaces of bunker transfer of LNG in maritime and inland waterway transport."},
    {"Article": "12", "Suffix": "2", "type": "pol:hasProvision", "value": "In the absence of a standard containing detailed technical specifications for refuelling points for LNG for maritime and inland waterway transport, referred to in point (a) of paragraph 10, and in particular in the absence of those specifications relating to bunkering of LNG, the Commission, taking into account the work ongoing within the IMO, the CCNR, the Danube Commission and other relevant international fora, shall be empowered to adopt delegated acts in accordance with Article 8 to lay down requirements for interfaces of bunker transfer of LNG in maritime and inland waterway transport. Pooling agreements shall be the subject of the reporting obligations of the member states under this directive."}
]

    {"Article": "heat pump", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "A device that transfers heat from one place to another for the purposes of heating or cooling."},
    {"Article": "fossil fuel", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "A natural fuel formed in geological formations from dead and decaying organisms over millions of years, such as coal, oil, and natural gas."},
    {"Article": "energy performance contracting", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "An agreement between a building owner and an energy service company to improve the energy efficiency of a facility."},
    {"Article": "cogeneration", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "The simultaneous production of electricity and heat from a single fuel source, improving overall efficiency."},
    {"Article": "building", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "A structure with walls and a roof, used for human occupancy or storage of goods."},

    {"Article": "energy service", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "The provision of energy to consumers for various purposes, including heating, cooling, lighting, and powering devices."},
    {"Article": "energy efficiency", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "The ratio of useful output to the amount of energy used by a system or process, indicating how effectively energy is utilized."},
    {"Article": "final energy consumption", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "The total amount of energy consumed at the point of use for end-users, after all transformations and losses in the supply chain."},
    {"Article": "primary energy consumption", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "The total amount of energy used in its original form before any conversion or transformation into other forms of energy."}
]

[
    {"Article": "Below is the definition of terms used in the article.", "Suffix": "type", "Value": "http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/Text"},
    {"Article": "energy efficiency improvement", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "The process of enhancing energy efficiency through modifications or improvements."},
    {"Article": "individual action", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "Actions taken by individuals to improve their own energy usage and reduce waste."},
    {"Article": "total useful floor area", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "The sum of all floor areas that are usable for specific purposes within a building."},
    {"Article": "energy service provider", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "An entity that provides energy services to consumers, such as electricity or gas."},
    {"Article": "nearly zero-energy building", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "A building with very low energy requirements for heating, cooling, lighting, and other plug loads, primarily from renewable sources."},
    {"Article": "heat pump", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "A device that transfers heat from one place to another for the purposes of heating or cooling."},
    {"Article": "fossil fuel", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "A natural fuel formed in geological formations from dead and decaying organisms over millions of years, such as coal, oil, and natural gas."},
    {"Article": "energy performance contracting", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "An agreement between a building owner and an energy service company to improve the energy efficiency of a facility."},
    {"Article": "cogeneration", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "The simultaneous production of electricity and heat from a single fuel source, improving overall efficiency."},
    {"Article": "building", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "A structure with walls and a roof, used for human occupancy or storage of goods."},
    {"Article": "retail energy sales company", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "A business that sells electricity or other forms of energy directly to consumers."},
    {"Article": "distribution system operator", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "An entity responsible for the operation and maintenance of an electrical distribution network."},
    {"Article": "energy distributor", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "A company that distributes electricity or other forms of energy from a supplier to end-users."},
    {"Article": "implementing public authority", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "A government body responsible for enforcing regulations and implementing policies related to energy use and efficiency."},
    {"Article": "obligated party", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "An entity that is legally required to comply with specific regulations or standards, such as those related to energy consumption or emissions."},
    {"Article": "energy service", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "The provision of energy to consumers for various purposes, including heating, cooling, lighting, and powering devices."},
    {"Article": "energy efficiency", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "The ratio of useful output to the amount of energy used by a system or process, indicating how effectively energy is utilized."},
    {"Article": "final energy consumption", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "The total amount of energy consumed at the point of use for end-users, after all transformations and losses in the supply chain."},
    {"Article": "primary energy consumption", "Suffix": "definition", "Value": "The total amount of energy used in its original form before any conversion or transformation into other forms of energy."}
]

    {"Article": "1", "Suffix": "", "type": "Title", "value": "Verification of compliance with sustainability criteria"},
    {"Article": "1", "Suffix": "", "type": "Content", "value": "This Article sets out the rules for verifying compliance with the sustainability criteria for biofuels and bioliquids."},
    {"Article": "1", "Suffix": "a", "type": "Instrument", "value": "Directive"},
    {"Article": "1", "Suffix": "a", "type": "Title", "value": "Verification of compliance with sustainability criteria"},
    {"Article": "1", "Suffix": "a", "type": "Content", "value": "Member States shall ensure that biofuels and bioliquids comply with the sustainability criteria set out in Article 17."},
    {"Article": "1", "Suffix": "b", "type": "Instrument", "value": "Directive"},
    {"Article": "1", "Suffix": "b", "type": "Title", "value": "Verification of compliance with sustainability criteria"},
    {"Article": "1", "Suffix": "b", "type": "Content", "value": "The Commission shall adopt delegated acts in accordance with Article 25(3) to specify the methods for verifying compliance with the sustainability criteria."},
    {"Article": "1", "Suffix": "c", "type": "Instrument", "value": "Directive"},
    {"Article": "1", "Suffix": "c", "type": "Title", "value": "Verification of compliance with sustainability criteria"},
    {"Article": "1", "Suffix": "c", "type": "Content", "value": "Member States shall ensure that the information provided by economic operators is accurate and reliable."},
    {"Article": "4", "Suffix": "", "type": "Instrument", "value": "Directive"},
    {"Article": "4", "Suffix": "", "type": "Title", "value": "Recognition of agreements and schemes"},
    {"Article": "4", "Suffix": "", "type": "Content", "value": "The Commission may decide that certain agreements or schemes demonstrate compliance with the sustainability criteria."},
    {"Article": "5", "Suffix": "", "type": "Instrument", "value": "Directive"},
    {"Article": "5", "Suffix": "", "type": "Title", "value": "Conditions for recognition of agreements and schemes"},
    {"Article": "5", "Suffix": "", "type": "Content", "value": "Decisions under Article 4 shall be adopted only if the agreement or scheme meets adequate standards of reliability, transparency and independent auditing."},
    {"Article": "6", "Suffix": "", "type": "Instrument", "value": "Directive"},
    {"Article": "6", "Suffix": "", "type": "Title", "value": "Procedure for recognition of agreements and schemes"},
    {"Article": "6", "Suffix": "", "type": "Content", "value": "Decisions under Article 4 shall be adopted in accordance with the advisory procedure referred to in Article 25(3) and shall be valid for a period of no more than five years."},
    {"Article": "7", "Suffix": "", "type": "Instrument", "value": "Directive"},
    {"Article": "7", "Suffix": "", "type": "Title", "value": "Use of recognised agreements and schemes"},
    {"Article": "7", "Suffix": "", "type": "Content", "value": "When an economic operator provides proof or data obtained in accordance with a recognised agreement or scheme, Member States shall not require further evidence of compliance."},
    {"Article": "8", "Suffix": "", "type": "Instrument", "value": "Directive"},
    {"Article": "8", "Suffix": "", "type": "Title", "value": "Examination of application of sustainability criteria"},
    {"Article": "8", "Suffix": "", "type": "Content", "value": "The Commission shall examine the application of Article 17 in relation to a source of biofuel or bioliquid and decide whether it may be taken into account."},
    {"Article": "9", "Suffix": "", "type": "Instrument", "value": "Directive"},
    {"Article": "9", "Suffix": "", "type": "Title", "value": "Report on effectiveness of sustainability criteria system"},
    {"Article": "9", "Suffix": "", "type": "Content", "value": "The Commission shall report to the European Parliament and the Council on the effectiveness of the system for providing information on sustainability criteria and whether mandatory requirements should be introduced."}
]

    {"Subject": "Article", "Predicate": "hasContent", "Object": "as part of the review referred to in paragraph 1 of this article, the commission shall assess the feasibility of developing real-world emission test procedures using portable emission measurement systems (pems). the commission shall take into account that assessment as well as those made pursuant to article 12 of this regulation and may, where appropriate, review the procedures for measuring co2 emissions as set out under regulation (ec) no 715/2007. the commission shall, in particular, make appropriate proposals to adapt those procedures to reflect adequately the real-world co2 emissions of passenger cars and light commercial vehicles."},
    {"Subject": "Article", "Predicate": "hasSuffix", "Object": "4"},
    {"Subject": "Article", "Predicate": "hasContent", "Object": "as part of the review referred to in paragraph 1 of this article, the commission shall evaluate the possibility to assign the revenue from the excess emissions premiums to a specific fund or a relevant programme, with the objective to ensure a just transition towards a climate-neutral economy as referred to in article 4.1 of the paris agreement, in particular to support re-skilling, up-skilling and other skills training and reallocation of workers in the automotive sector in all affected member states, in particular in the regions and the communities most affected by the transition. the commission shall, if appropriate, make a legislative proposal to that effect by 2027 at the latest."},
    {"Subject": "Article", "Predicate": "hasSuffix", "Object": "5"},
    {"Subject": "Article", "Predicate": "hasContent", "Object": "by 31 december 2020, the commission shall review directive 1999/94/ec considering the need to provide consumers with accurate, robust and comparable information on the fuel consumption, co2 emissions and air pollutant emissions of new passenger cars placed on the market, as well as evaluate the options for introducing a fuel economy and co2 emissions label for new light commercial vehicles. the review shall, where appropriate, be accompanied by a legislative proposal."},
    {"Subject": "Article", "Predicate": "hasSuffix", "Object": "6"},
    {"Subject": "Article", "Predicate": "hasContent", "Object": "the commission shall, by means of implementing acts, determine the correlation parameters necessary in order to reflect any change in the regulatory test procedure for the measurement of specific emissions of co2 referred to in regulations (ec) no 715/2007 and (ec) no 692/2008 and, where applicable, regulation (eu) 2017/1151. those implementing acts shall be adopted in accordance with the examination procedure referred to in article 16(2) of this regulation."},
    {"Subject": "Article", "Predicate": "hasSuffix", "Object": "7"},
    {"Subject": "Article", "Predicate": "hasContent", "Object": "the commission is empowered to adopt delegated acts in accordance with article 17 in order to amend this regulation by adapting the formulae set out in annex i, using the methodology adopted pursuant to paragraph 7 of this article, while ensuring that reduction requirements of comparable stringency for manufacturers and vehicles of different utility are required under the old and new test procedures."}
]
